title: Reddit
cleaned_text: Talk is a "softcore" news subreddit about various things happening in different countries. While large news posts are allowed, the aim of this subreddit is to share things that aren't typically considered large news in other countries, rather just things people are talking about. I noticed English Wikipedia described it rather negatively as a kind of pseudoscience while doctors here in Japan commonly prescribe Chinese medicines (known as [Kampo](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kampo)) for patients by trusting their effect.
